section.title: Overview
section.p: The SM GUI URL is accessible through HTTP or HTTPS. If a user accesses SM GUI using HTTP, then a redirect is done to HTTPS. From next time onwards, the GUI access is allowed using HTTPS only.
SM accesses the managed elements through SOAP over HTTPS. The SOAP services use the following common security constraints:

li.p: Bi-directional certificate exchange, that is, the server SPS expects the client SM to send an appropriate certificate.
